answerText: chemical kinetics [or word forms][10] Kinetics concerns itself with the laws governing this property of a reaction, a measure of how fast it is.
heading: Padawan |2014 | 3 | 4 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: A popular technique in this field of chemistry is the "temperature jump", in which a capacitor is discharged in a conducting solution. For 10 points each: [10] Identify this field of study in chemistry pioneered by Gulberg and Waage with their law of mass action, and furthered by the equations of Eyring and Arrhenius.
